column4: my computer is pretty much unusable without a keyboard and mouse
I guess I might as well go watch tv or something
and the mouse dont work either
it worked fine in 9.10 before I upgraded
I am bummed out
I might just go back to debian
there is something not right in 10.04
and I am not the only person having a problem
but seems no one knows of a fix
so I am stuck
What you probably need is a comparison of the output of dmesg both on 9.10 and 10.04
that way you can see what part did not connect right.
not possible at this point
It's possible if you boot your box from a Live CD of 9.10
*if* your WL desktop was supported out of the box without any extras that is.
Please file a bug with as much meaningful info on your hardware setup as possible
right now I am just doing what I can do have a usuable computer
I am not really in the frame of mind to file bug reports
I don thave a 9.10 live cd
does the USB dongle show up in lsusb?
yeah
did you try to compare the dmesg output from the 9.10 LiveCD with your current dmesg? that might give some clues
